categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: Doctor Oron was a professor of archaeology on the planet Jandoon. He was sold a communications base on Delari Prime during the Galactic Civil War. He had a daughter named Meela.

In the wake of retiring as Master Historian, Arhul Hextrophon took possession of the master database of ancient text compiled by Oron from his daughter. Among the collection of creation myths that proved vital to Hextrophon's work.
